M

main(String[]) - Static method in class com.risk.main.Run
 
mapConnected(Country) - Method in class com.risk.model.utilities.Validate
Given a Country, this method recursively goes through this country's neighbours and adds then to countriesModelValidationList If (countriesModelValidationList.size() == map.getCountries().size()) then from a given country, we can travel to all other countries, so map is connected

moveArmyHandler() - Method in class com.risk.controller.ConqueredController

moveCards(Player) - Method in class com.risk.model.player.Player
This method is used to move cards from the player who lost the last country to the player who conquered that country
moveComplete() - Method in class com.risk.controller.ConqueredController
This method ends the conquer move When the number of army moved is equal or more than the number of dice the player rolled Then it allows him to end the move
moveHandler() - Method in class com.risk.controller.FortificationController
This method handles the movement of armies selected country to adjacent country
